# Function reference

## Base Designs

Generate Random LHD

| | |
| --- | --- |
| [base_designs.permutations_matrix](base_designs.permutations_matrix.qmd#pyLHD.base_designs.permutations_matrix) | Generate (n_rows x n_columns) matrix, in which each column is a random permutation of {1,2,...,n_rows} |
| [base_designs.random_lhd](base_designs.random_lhd.qmd#pyLHD.base_designs.random_lhd) | Generate a random Latin Hypercube Design |
| [base_designs.GLPdesign](base_designs.GLPdesign.qmd#pyLHD.base_designs.GLPdesign) | Good Lattice Point (GLP) Design  |

## Orthogonal LHD

Various constructions of orthogonal latin hypercube designs

| | |
| --- | --- |
| [OLHD.OLHD_Butler01](OLHD.OLHD_Butler01.qmd#pyLHD.OLHD.OLHD_Butler01) | Orthogonal Latin Hypercube Design (OLHD). Based on the construction method of Butler (2001) |
| [OLHD.OLHD_Sun10](OLHD.OLHD_Sun10.qmd#pyLHD.OLHD.OLHD_Sun10) | Orthogonal Latin Hypercube Design (OLHD). Based on the construction method of Sun et al. (2010) |
| [OLHD.OLHD_Cioppa07](OLHD.OLHD_Cioppa07.qmd#pyLHD.OLHD.OLHD_Cioppa07) | Orthogonal Latin Hyercube Design. Based on the construction method of Cioppa and Lucas (2007) |
| [OLHD.OLHD_Ye98](OLHD.OLHD_Ye98.qmd#pyLHD.OLHD.OLHD_Ye98) | Orthogonal Latin Hyercube Design. Based on the construction method of Ye (1998) |
| [OLHD.OLHD_Lin09](OLHD.OLHD_Lin09.qmd#pyLHD.OLHD.OLHD_Lin09) | Orthogonal Latin Hypercube Design. Based on the construction method of Lin et al. (2009) |

## Criteria

Space-filling Criterias for LHD

| | |
| --- | --- |
| [criteria.MaxAbsCor](criteria.MaxAbsCor.qmd#pyLHD.criteria.MaxAbsCor) | Calculate the Maximum Absolute Correlation |
| [criteria.MaxProCriterion](criteria.MaxProCriterion.qmd#pyLHD.criteria.MaxProCriterion) | Calculate the Maximum Projection Criterion |
| [criteria.phi_p](criteria.phi_p.qmd#pyLHD.criteria.phi_p) | Calculate the phi_p Criterion |
| [criteria.inter_site](criteria.inter_site.qmd#pyLHD.criteria.inter_site) | Calculate the Inter-site Distance |
| [criteria.AvgAbsCor](criteria.AvgAbsCor.qmd#pyLHD.criteria.AvgAbsCor) | Calculate the Average Absolute Correlation |
| [criteria.discrepancy](criteria.discrepancy.qmd#pyLHD.criteria.discrepancy) | Discrepancy of a given sample |
| [criteria.coverage](criteria.coverage.qmd#pyLHD.criteria.coverage) | Compute the coverage measure for a design |
| [criteria.maximin](criteria.maximin.qmd#pyLHD.criteria.maximin) | Compute the maximin criterion for a given design. A higher value corresponds to a more regular scattering of design points. |
| [criteria.mesh_ratio](criteria.mesh_ratio.qmd#pyLHD.criteria.mesh_ratio) | Compute the meshratio criterion for a given design |

## Helpers

miscellaneous utilities for working with LHDs

| | |
| --- | --- |
| [helpers.permute_columns](helpers.permute_columns.qmd#pyLHD.helpers.permute_columns) | Random permute columns in a numpy ndarray |
| [helpers.exchange](helpers.exchange.qmd#pyLHD.helpers.exchange) | Exchange two random elements in a matrix |
| [helpers.williams_transform](helpers.williams_transform.qmd#pyLHD.helpers.williams_transform) | Williams Transformation |
| [helpers.OA2LHD](helpers.OA2LHD.qmd#pyLHD.helpers.OA2LHD) | Transform an Orthogonal Array (OA) into an LHD |
| [helpers.eval_design](helpers.eval_design.qmd#pyLHD.helpers.eval_design) | Evaluate a design based on a chosen criteria, a simple wrapper for all `criteria` in `pyLHD` |
| [helpers.adjust_range](helpers.adjust_range.qmd#pyLHD.helpers.adjust_range) | Adjust the range of a design to [min,max] |
| [helpers.scale](helpers.scale.qmd#pyLHD.helpers.scale) | Scales design to be within [0,1] |
| [helpers.distance_matrix](helpers.distance_matrix.qmd#pyLHD.helpers.distance_matrix) | Distance matrix based on specified distance measure |
